get.description:
Returns a list of ATMs with Address, Latitude and Longitude.

 

Optional parameters include search filters, latitude, longitide and radius of search.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude of the place around which you want to find ATMs. If latitude is provided, longitude must also be provided.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude of the place around which you want to find ATMs. If longitude is provided, latitude must also be provided.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: This is the radius (in meters) from the search point. If radius is provided, then latitude and longitude has to also be provided

parameters.name: wheelchair
parameters.description: This is check (in boolean) to see if the ATM is accessible by wheelchair

parameters.name: isWithdrawalCharged
parameters.description: This is to check whether withdrawal of money from this ATM will be charged.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: This is to check if the ATM is currently available for withdrawing money.

parameters.name: openAt
parameters.description: This is the time (in hours format) at which the ATM needs to be checked if open

get.description:
Returns a list of Branches with Address, Latitude and Longitude.

 

Optional parameters include search filters, latitude, longitude and radius of search.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude of the place around which you want to find Branches. If latitude is provided, longitude must also be provided.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude of the place around which you want to find Branches. If longitude is provided, latitude must also be provided.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: This is the radius (in meters) from the search point. If radius is provided, then latitude and longitude has to also be provided

parameters.name: wheelchair
parameters.description: This is check (in boolean) to see if the Branch is accessible by wheelchair.

parameters.name: openAt
parameters.description: This is the time (in hours format) at which the Branch needs to be checked if open

name.description: User addressable name of the ATM.

currency.description: Currency of notes that is disposed by the ATM.

access.description: Available accessibility features of the ATM.

name.description: User addressable name of the Branch.

access.description: Available accessibility features of the Branch.
